title: Zsolt Szabó (referee)
text:
Zsolt Szabó (born 1 January 1972) is a <a href="Hungarians">Hungarian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Referee%20%28association%20football%29">referee</a>. He was a full international for <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> beginning in 1999; as of 2013, however, he was not included on the FIFA list.
Szabó served as a referee in qualification for the <a href="2006%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28UEFA%29">2006</a> and <a href="2010%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28UEFA%29">2010</a> World Cup tournaments, in addition to qualifiers for the <a href="2003%20FIFA%20Women%27s%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28UEFA%29">2003 FIFA Women's World Cup</a>. He also officiated in qualifiers for the <a href="UEFA%20Euro%202004%20qualification">Euro 2004</a> and <a href="UEFA%20Euro%202008%20qualification">Euro 2008</a> tournaments, the <a href="2002%20UEFA%20European%20Under-17%20Football%20Championship">2002 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship</a>, and the <a href="2007%20UEFA%20European%20Under-21%20Football%20Championship">2007 UEFA European Under-21 Football Championship</a>.
